column5: 綾華：ねぇねぇパパ！
column6: Hey, hey, Papa!

column5: 綾華ね、友達ができたんだよ！
column6: Ayaka's made a friend!

column5: メイ：これは、ＨＥシステムのＣＤＲＯＭディスクです
column6: This is an HE System CD-ROM disc.

column5: ２曲目に、コンピュータ用データが入っていますので、再生しないで下さい
column6: Track 2 contains data for computer use, so please do not play it.

column5: ナビ：これは、ＨＥシステムのＣＤＲＯＭディスクです
column6: This is an HE System CD-ROM disc.

column5: ２曲目に、コンピュータ用データが入っていますので、再生しないで下さい
column6: Track 2 contains data for computer use, so please do not play it.

column5: 素子：レディース・アンド・ジェントルメン！
column6: Ladies and gentlemen!

column5: ディス・イズ・早口言葉ショー！
column6: This is...The Tongue Twister Show!

column5: 素子：それでは、一番って、ナビさんにチャレンジしてもらいましょ！
column6: All righty then! First off, let's have Navi give it a go!

column5: ナビ：やぁ！三連発いきま〜す！
column6: Yaah! Here comes the triple barrage!

column5: ナビ：バスガス爆発
column6: Basu gasu bakuhatsu! Tonari no kyaku wa yoku kaki kuu kyaku da!
column7:
NOTE: my reference for all of these was https://hayakutikotoba.web.fc2.com/, like hell i'd have tried to transcribe them on my own

"Bus gas explosion"

column5: 隣の客はよく柿食う客だ
column7: "The customer next to me eats lots of persimmon"

column5: かえるぴょこぴょこ３（み）ぴょこぴょこ あわせてぴょこぴょこ６（む）ぴょこぴょこ
column6: Kaeru pyokopyoko mipyokopyoko awasete pyokopyoko mupyokopyoko!
column7: ...okay, i had to look up an explanation here. apparently the idea is basically "the frogs hop. three frogs hop, and matching them, [three more hop, so] six frogs hop"

column5: ナビ：それじゃですね、次は…素子！いってみよう！
column6: Well then, next is...
Motoko! Go for it!

column5: 素子：ちょちょちょちょちょちょっと、いきなりあたしに[振るう?]！？
column6: W-w-w-w-w-wait, you're calling on ME all of a sudden!?

column5: い、ととときょ…
column6: I, To-To-To-Toky...Right, okay!

column5: あ、うん！
素子：東京特許許可局
column6: T-toukyou tokkyo kyoka kyoku!

column5: メイ（？）：それじゃ、綾華
column6: All right, Ayaka...Your turn, eh?

column5: あなたの出番ね？
綾華：ええ〜？
column6: Huuuh...? Can Ayaka really do it...?

column5: 綾華、出来るかな…
うんっとね…
column6: Umm, right...

column5: 綾華：「隣の家に部屋ができたってね[かっこい?]」
column6: A room was built in the house next door! COOL!
column7: NOTE: don't know if this is based on a real one or not, but obviously it's not right

column5: 観客：そりゃ違うって！
column6: Hey, that's wrong!

column5: 綾華：あははははは！
ごめん！次はかんなちゃんだよ！
column6: Sorry! Next up is Kanna!

column5: かんな：わ、私？
column6: M-me?

column5: かんな：生麦生米生卵
column6: Namamugi namagome namatamago!
column7:
NOTE: apparently the audience thinks she said it wrong; i honestly can't tell

"raw flour, raw rice, raw egg"

column5: 観客：違うんだね？
column6: ...That's not right, is it?

column5: かんな：最後はやっぱり、メイよね？
column6: Of course, last is you, May, right?

column5: メイ：やっぱり
column6: Of course. You were all fired up like {It'll be any minute now,} huh?

column5: そろそろかなぁ[って気合した?]んだよね？
素子：[ガツン?]っと一発ね！
column6:
Knock it out in one swift stroke!\n
Now, go for it!

column5: ま、合戦なさい！
メイ：あ、はい
column6: Ah, okay.

column5: メイ：[農林水産省俊才??]新人歌手新春シャンソンショー
column6: Nourinsuisanshou shunsai shinjinkashu shinshun shanson shou!
column7: NOTE: this seems to be based on something with many variations, and i couldn't find any that seem to match this one exactly. the last part is pretty clearly 新人歌手新春シャンソンショー, which is well-attested, but the first part isn't as obvious and is possibly just outright made up. best i can come up with is 農林水産省俊才, for "the Ministry of Agriculture, Forest, and Fisheries' new genius singer New Year's chanson show", which is dubious for a lot of reasons. suggestions are welcome.

column5: メイ：が〜ん…
column6: Gah...

column5: スクープされちゃった！
column6: They made me into a scoop!

column5: ナビ：何やってんですか！？
column6: What are you doing!?

column5: このゲームはスーパーＣＤＲＯＭ２専用ですよ！
column6:
This game is exclusively for the\n
Super CD-ROM[heart]!

column5: [いいん?]ですか！？
column6: Got it!? To play this game,

column5: このゲームは遊ぶには、スーパーシステムカードかスーパーＣＤＲＯＭ２対応のＰＣエンジンが必要なんですよ！

column6: you need a Super System Card or a Super CD-ROM[heart]--compatible PC-Engine!

column5: それなのに、それなのに…！
column6: But you just had to go and do this...!

column5: 素子：ほん〜と！メイったらお間抜けさんなのよね〜？
column6: For REAL! May, girl, you're what we call a grade A ziphead, y'know?

column5: メイ：も、素子！
column6: M-Motoko! What're you doing here?

column5: 何であんたがここにいるの？
ナビ・素子：では！
column6: Well, see you in the real game!

column5: ゲーム本編でお会いしましょう！
メイ：そ、それ、ボクのセリフ！
column6: T-that's my line!
